snippet: Leicester, which won European club rugby's grand prize in 2001 and 2002, will host Toulon, the current back-to-back champion, on Sunday.
lead_paragraph: Leicester, which won European club rugby's grand prize in 2001 and 2002, will host Toulon, the current back-to-back champion, on Sunday.

headline.main: Past Rugby Champions Look to Beat the Present Ones
headline.print_headline: Past Champions Look to Beat the Present Ones
